Package com.crudetech.lang

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EqualityComparer<T>
    When implemented it enables you to override an objects Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object) methods.
    InvocationService
    When implemented, it offers several methods to dispatch a Runnable to another thread.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRunnable
    A basic Runnable implementation that takes care of checked exceptions.
    BoundedValue<T>
    A simple value type that has a fixed range defined by an an open interval, where the lower bound is inside and the upper bound is outside of the range.
    ComparableBoundedValue<T extends Comparable<T>,Derived extends ComparableBoundedValue<T,Derived>>
    Extension of BoundedValue to implement Comparable.
    Compare
    Simple helper class that offers standard comparing functionality with additional null checks
    Enums  
    If
    This class offers simple methods for common boolean checks, typically done in if clauses.
    SneakyThrow
    Helper class to throw checked exceptions without being forced to declare a throws clause.
    VerifyArgument
    This class offers basic argument checking functionality.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ArgumentNullException
    Although it is common practice to throw a NullPointerException in such cases, it is more and more considered bad practice these days.
    ArgumentOutOfBoundsException
    This exception is thrown when a given argument is not within its expected bounds.
    IncompleteArgumentException  
    NotImplementedException  
    UnhandledException
    This exception is thrown when it is impossible or undesirable to consume or throw a checked exception.
